faqs.q: How many calories in one strip steak?
faqs.a: About 601 kcal for a standard 225 g cooked strip steak.

faqs.q: How much protein is in strip steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 26 g protein per 100 g, or 59 g per 225 g steak.
Yes, it contains about 17 g total fat per 100 g, including 7 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Calories in raw vs cooked strip steak?
faqs.a: Raw is lower (~200 kcal/100 g) due to higher water content; cooking concentrates nutrients.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in strip steak?
faqs.a: Grilling keeps it lower; frying or adding oil/butter can add 40+ kcal per 100 g.
